          nextValue.splice(index, 1);

          nextValue.push(option);
        }
      } else {
        nextValue = option;
      }
      return nextValue;
    }

        if (option && (typeof option === 'undefined' ? 'undefined' : _typeof(option)) === 'object') {
          result = value.value === option.value;
        } else {
          result = value.value === option;
        }
      } else {
        if (option && (typeof option === 'undefined' ? 'undefined' : _typeof(option)) === 'object') {
          result = value === option.value;
        } else {
          result = value === option;
        }
      }
      return result;
    }
